outputs.output_descr: The objectives of the Transitional Solutions Initiative for Colombia, developed in consultation with the national authorities, are to: a) support affected communities and local authorities to provide specific successful examples of solutions for Internal Displaced Population-IDPs and, b) in coordination with national authorities, promote the consolidation of a comprehensive policy for solutions, based on lessons learnt in the areas of return, relocation, and local integration.

project_descr: Transitional Solutions Initiative-TSI between UNDP and UNHCR. From the assistance to sustainable solutions for Internal Displaced Populations.
